tier.item: "The girl and the boy are hitting each other.'
(32) a. musidzana na mutukana vha khou rw-an-a
"The girl and the boy are hitting each other.'

The girl and the boy are hitting each other.
b. musidzana u khou rw-an-a na mutukana
(lit.) "The girl is hitting each other with the boy."

(lit.) "The girl is hitting each other with the boy."
